"Marimo": "Please make sure that you're fully prepared, during your battles and during your investigations."
"Coming back unharmed. That's most important, yes?"
"Excuse me, do you have a moment?"
"I wanted to ask for your help in another one of my investigations."
"It's just... The location is slightly dreadful, so I hesitate to ask, you see..."
"Well, I'd be happy even if you just listened to what I had to say."
"The place I'd like you to investigate... is deep within Outer Mediola: Sector 1."
"It is an incredibly dangerous place with many formidable enemies."
"Knowing this danger, would you still be willing to help?"
"I see... Well, it can't be helped then."
"There must be many landscapes in this world that have yet to be seen."
"Likewise, if you also find any new landscapes, please do let me know about them."
"I will be looking forward to it, yes?"
